MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G82 postcode area of Dumbarton. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6.30pm to repair an underground cable fault on Miller Court and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.25pm on Friday 20th November 2020.
